title: A Hero Among The Angels: Book 1
description: The battle between Heaven and Hell is about to change its course. A new kind of hero has emerged from the mortals. When Tom Nolan's morning at the park is interrupted by the enigmatic Damian Na Imad, his life takes an extraordinary turn. Through Damian's guidance, Tom learns of his unique gifts and abilities, and embarks on a quest to reestablish the balance between Heaven and Hell. Mankind now has someone to fight for them. An angel soul in a human body, Tom - Sariel - will transform into something that even the archangels didn't know could exist.
author: L. Bilt
